unnormalised: The Ministry of Finance has issued a notification regarding the new regulations for foreign investments. All correspondence related to this matter should be directed to: The Under Secretary, Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance, North Block, New Delhi, 110001. The notification, dated 22/07/2024, outlines the procedures for approval of investments exceeding Rs. 50 crore.
normalised: The Ministry of Finance has issued a notification regarding the new regulations for foreign investments. All correspondence related to this matter should be directed to: The Under Secretary, Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance, North Block, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one. The notification, dated twenty second july two thousand and twenty four, outlines the procedures for approval of investments exceeding rupees fifty crore.

unnormalised: Furthermore, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced changes to the KYC norms for opening new bank accounts. Citizens are required to submit valid proof of address as per the revised guidelines. Inquiries can be addressed to the RBI Regional Office at 6, Sansad Marg, New Delhi, 110001. The circular number RBI/2024-25/123, issued on 10/08/2024, provides detailed instructions.
normalised: Furthermore, the Reserve Bank of India (R-B-I) has announced changes to the K-Y-C norms for opening new bank accounts. Citizens are required to submit valid proof of address as per the revised guidelines. Inquiries can be addressed to the R-B-I Regional Office at six, Sansad Marg, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one. The circular number R-B-I slash two thousand and twenty four hyphen twenty five slash one hundred and twenty three, issued on tenth august two thousand and twenty four, provides detailed instructions.

unnormalised: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi has announced the commencement of admissions for the upcoming academic year. Prospective students can find the application forms and relevant information on the institute's website. The official address for correspondence is: IIT Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, 110016. The last date for submission of applications is 30/06/2024.
normalised: The Indian Institute of Technology (I-I-T) Delhi has announced the commencement of admissions for the upcoming academic year. Prospective students can find the application forms and relevant information on the institute's website. The official address for correspondence is: I-I-T Delhi, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and sixteen. The last date for submission of applications is thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai (MCGM) has launched a new initiative to improve waste management in the city. Residents are encouraged to segregate waste at source and dispose of it responsibly. For any grievances or complaints, citizens can contact the MCGM headquarters at: Mahapalika Marg, Fort, Mumbai, 400001. A helpline number, 1916, has also been established for immediate assistance.
normalised: The Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai (M-C-G-M) has launched a new initiative to improve waste management in the city. Residents are encouraged to segregate waste at source and dispose of it responsibly. For any grievances or complaints, citizens can contact the M-C-G-M headquarters at: Mahapalika Marg, Fort, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and one. A helpline number, one thousand nine hundred and sixteen, has also been established for immediate assistance.

unnormalised: The Election Commission of India (ECI) has announced the schedule for the upcoming state assembly elections. Voters are urged to verify their names in the electoral rolls and update their addresses if necessary. The ECI headquarters is located at: Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi, 110001. The deadline for updating voter details is 15/10/2024, as per notification no. ECI/PN/123/2024.
normalised: The Election Commission of India (E-C-I) has announced the schedule for the upcoming state assembly elections. Voters are urged to verify their names in the electoral rolls and update their addresses if necessary. The E-C-I headquarters is located at: Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one. The deadline for updating voter details is fifteenth october two thousand and twenty four, as per notification number E-C-I slash P-N slash one hundred and twenty three slash two thousand and twenty four.
